verses.text:
I'm coming to the cross; I'm poor and weak and blind;
I'm counting all but dross; I shall full salvation find.

I'm trusting in the Lord, I'm trusting in His word;
I'm trusting in the blood; I'm leaning on the Lord.

I'm coming to the cross, I'm counting all but dross;
I'm trusting in the Lord, I'm blessed Lord of the cross.

chorus.text:
I'm trusting, Lord, in Thee, blessed Lord of Calvary;
Humbly at Thy cross I bow, Save me, Je - sus, save me now.
